math.alttext: \hat{H}_{\rm int}=\frac{u}{2N}\sum_{{\bf pkq}}\hat{b}^{\dagger}_{\bf p}\hat{b}% ^{\dagger}_{\bf q}\hat{b}_{\bf{q}-\bf{k}}\hat{b}_{{\bf p}+{\bf k}}\,,\qquad u=% \frac{4\pi\hbar^{2}aN}{mV}\,.

math.alttext: \tilde{D}_{1}(\beta;N)=\frac{u\beta}{N}{\rm Tr}_{\rm ex}\left\{\left[\delta_{% \hat{N}_{\rm ex},N}-\delta_{\hat{N}_{\em ex},N-1}\right]\sum_{{\bf k}\neq 0}% \frac{\hat{n}_{\bf k}(\hat{n}_{\bf k}-1)}{2}e^{-\beta\hat{H}_{0}}\right\}-(N-1% )u\beta\tilde{D}_{0}(\beta;N)\,.

n_{\bf k}(\alpha;\beta,N)=\frac{1}{e^{\alpha+\beta\varepsilon_{k}}-1}\,,

OVERACCENT:tilde ARG:start italic-F ARG:end OPEN:( italic-alpha PUNCT:; italic-beta PUNCT:, italic-N CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-N italic-alpha ADDOP:plus italic-N FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-v ARG:end ARG:start italic-lambda POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end OVERACCENT:tilde ARG:start italic-g ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:5 MULOP:divide NUMBER:2 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-alpha CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
\tilde{F}(\alpha;\beta,N)=N\alpha+N\frac{v}{\lambda^{3}}\tilde{g}_{5/2}(\alpha% )\,.

italic-lambda OPEN:( italic-beta CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-square-root ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi ID:Planck-constant-over-2-pi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide OPEN:( italic-m italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:start B POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-T CLOSE:) ARG:end PUNCT:,
\lambda(\beta)=\sqrt{2\pi\hbar^{2}/(mk_{\rm B}T)}\,,

OVERACCENT:tilde ARG:start italic-g ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:5 MULOP:divide NUMBER:2 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-alpha PUNCT:; italic-beta PUNCT:, italic-N CLOSE:) RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-lambda POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-N italic-v ARG:end SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start bold-k RELOP:not-equals NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPFUNCTION:natural-logarithm OPEN:[ NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus italic-alpha ADDOP:minus italic-beta italic-varepsilon POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:] PERIOD:.
\tilde{g}_{5/2}(\alpha;\beta,N)=-\frac{\lambda^{3}}{Nv}\sum_{{\bf k}\neq 0}\ln% \left[1-e^{-\alpha-\beta\varepsilon_{k}}\right]\,.

italic-g POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-sigma POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-alpha CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start Gamma OPEN:( italic-sigma CLOSE:) ARG:end INTOP:integral POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ID:infinity POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-d italic-x FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-x POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-sigma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-x ADDOP:plus italic-alpha POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 ARG:end PERIOD:.
g_{\sigma}(\alpha)=\frac{1}{\Gamma(\sigma)}\int_{0}^{\infty}dx\frac{x^{\sigma-% 1}}{e^{x+\alpha}-1}\,.

italic-I POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-sigma POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-beta PUNCT:; italic-N CLOSE:) RELOP:equals INTOP:integral FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-d italic-alpha ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-i ARG:end OPEN:[ NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus italic-alpha POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:] italic-g POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-sigma POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-alpha CLOSE:) italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-F OPEN:( italic-alpha PUNCT:; italic-beta PUNCT:, italic-N CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
I_{\sigma}(\beta;N)=\int\frac{d\alpha}{2\pi i}\left[1-e^{-\alpha}\right]g_{% \sigma}(\alpha)e^{F(\alpha;\beta,N)}\,.

italic-g POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-sigma POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-alpha CLOSE:) RELOP:equals Gamma OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-sigma CLOSE:) italic-alpha POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-sigma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n RELOP:equals NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ID:infinity POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start OPEN:( ADDOP:minus CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-n POSTFIX:factorial ARG:end italic-zeta OPEN:( italic-sigma ADDOP:minus italic-n CLOSE:) italic-alpha POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
g_{\sigma}(\alpha)=\Gamma(1-\sigma)\alpha^{\sigma-1}+\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{% (-)^{n}}{n!}\zeta(\sigma-n)\alpha^{n}\,.
